sections.general: project manager and technical implementation career overview contribute my knowledge to the institution, willing to learn new skills and take on new challenges in it. ensuring commitment, efficiency and quality in the roles assigned to contribute to the achievement of strategic objectives outlined by the institution. systems architect with expertise in requirement gathering and analysis, architectural, component and interface design and development for as/400 applications in multiples domains. qualifications as/400 administrator excellent problem solving abilities cl/400 project manager integration across ipc (incident, problem, & change management) web application utility: query and sql security as/400 aldom/acces setting goals and objectives adaptation model ethical management qa tools analyst programmer enterprise technologies well tracking system upgrade/migration/back up management management and teamwork development of departmental budgets data backup and retrieval as/400 coaching and effective delegation of tasks. prioritization tasks excellent communication skills clear quest / sharepoint decision-making and conflict. product template manage multiple tasks simultaneous rpgle/ile ability to perform hands on work team. technical specifications creations management of meeting and time production. cobol/400 strong knowledge of itil. technical skills skills experience total years last used it project manager analyst & as/400 administrator 13 2016 accomplishments -implementation core banking (as/400) company: fiserv -upgrade core banking
